resources.string: Swipe up and down until the image is clearly in focus

You must accept the permissions that are required by this app before using the app.
 
 Permissions required are:
 - Camera: the camera is used for scanning documents
 - Write external storage: the documents are saved in external storage

Place each page down in front of the camera and wait for the screen to flash or the sound to play, then move on to the next page of your scan. Once you are done with all pages, you can exit to sort through your scanned pages.
